name: TheCore Lite v2.3.7
body:
## Changelog

* Multiplayer up-to-date
* Coop clean-up

## Project status

Project in maintenance mode only. Multiplayer patches will be taken care of. No particular care for Coop (feedback from community is welcome to enhance that)

## Want to help?

If you find something that can be enhanced, here is the invite to TheCoreLite Discord thread:
https://discord.gg/CeC7MEG

name: TheCore Lite v2.3.6
body:
## Multiplayer
* Support for balance update as of patch 4.11.1
* Infestor spells: Neural Parasitic now on Space, RapidFire Neural is fine (Microbial Shroud use C for precision key)
* Infestation Pit researches: swap Pathogene Gland (now E) and Neural Parasitic (now Space)
* warp prism TransportMode back to R (#39)

## Coop and campaigns
* Coop now updated with patch 4.11.1 (thanks to Deluvi #40 and #41)

## General
* Grave group trash now overwrite CapsLock group (#36)

name: TheCore Lite v2.3.5
body:
## Multiplayer
* Repair now on 4 due to Coop Zergmech Drone

## Coop and campaigns
* Coop now updated with patch 4.9
* Some opportunistic campaign fixes (due to some strange Blizzard changes)
* Top Bars are bounded to Shift+F3 to F6 (coop players could adjust)

name: TheCore Lite v2.3.4
body:
update with change in Multi to support new burrow/unburrow implementation coming with next balance patch November 2018

## Multiplayer
* balance compatibility with upcoming balance patch November 2018
  * Now burrow=R unburrow=4 (previously Space/R)
  * Now cloak=Space uncloak=F (previously F/4)
* fix oracle consistency:
  * Now pulsar on=Space pulsaroff=F (previously F/4)
  * Revelation on C like scan, and stasis ward on both E and R (precision and RapidFire)

## Coop and campaigns
* Tychus support => no unbound, probably suboptimal
* coop unbound clean-up
* remove commander ability support on Function keys to fix bug #26
* fix some unbounds in Nova Mission pack
* new unbounds in Nova Mission pack: view workaround at issue #18 

## Infrastructure
* new SameCheck and Inheritance for next balance upgrade

name: TheCore Lite v2.3.3
body:
## General release notes

Only sligth changes on TheCore Lite, some bug fixes to fix unbounds poping due to Blizzard's patches, most unbound resolved for Nova's mission pack

Thanks all guys reporting issues and pull requesters \o/

## Changelog affecting Multiplayer

* swap hotkeys between queen and overlords speed: queen is now on E and ovi speed on V
* solve bug #11, LiftOff/Halt now on 5, select builder on 4
* land on 4 to adjust lift-off on 5
* fix issue #7, multi storm research on Space, energy upgrade on E (slight inconsistency out of multi)
* fix droplord command card, related to bug  #14 (patch 4.3.0)
* Minimap terrain on Shift+F1 to avoid conflicts with Replay (bug #19)
* fix issue #6, R as RapidFire alternate for chronoboost

## Changelog for campaign/coop support

* fix coop upgrades for mutalisk
* fix coop hotkey for BuildCreepTumor on Hatches (as consequence from queen/ovi speed swap)
* fix issue #13, new coop Stukov SIUproot is R (apart 5 for SI CC, conflict with universall CC/PF Load (R))
* fix most of Nova's mission pack unbounds (#18)

name: TheCore Lite v2.3.2
body:
## General release notes

TheCore Lite stabilizing since months, not too many changes. Some clean-up of doc after consistency checks

## Last commits
* push all last changes
* swap corruptor and mutalisk keys
* fix bug #12 ScienceVessel and Raven on same Starport key, Science Vessel now on C
* use Grave as direct access createsteal
* remove quick cam, reorder control cams

name: TheCore Lite v2.3.1
body:
## General release Notes
This new release moves Grave group to CapsLock with major changes for all former commands bound to this old legacy key. The last version with old CapsLock is v2.3.0 for those who would like to keep using it, and possibly fork.

## Highligths
* CapsLock now used as group, no more command mapped on it
* fix 4.0 patch unbounds

## UI changes
* introduction of quick cam, move Nexus mass recall to C, fix control cam
* new experiment about creep cams

## Minor changes
* Drone mutate lurker den on Space
* fix observer static/mobile keys
* change baneling keys according to issue #8
* ravager bile homogeneized with E,Space
* fix Abathur's Ravager Corrosive Bile
* add some RapidFire alternate to Root Stukov and Dehakas buildings (Coop), some issue with infested Command Center

name: TheCore Lite v2.3.0
body:
## General Release Notes
From v2.2.0 TheCore Lite got load of work to stabilize zerg keys, some enhancement came for Protoss units as well. Lately Basic Building got updated to better placements (for total changelog see individual release notes from v2.2.0)

## Changelog from 2.2.5a:
* Basic Building changed
  * CC/Hatch/Nexus on E (from C)
  * Gaz on F (from R)
  * EngBay/Evo/Forge on 4 (from E)
  * Barracks/Gateway on C (from CapsLock)
  * RoachWarren on R (from CapsLock)
  * Cybernetic Core on R (from F)
  * Bunker on R (from F)
  * Spine Crawler on C (from F)
* Updates to get Coop and Testing support (compatible with patch 3.19)
* Some various reported issues fixed

name: TheCore Lite v2.2.5a
body:
Unbound fixed after patch 3.13

No fundamental changes with respect to v2.2.5
https://github.com/bobo38/TheCoreLite/releases/tag/v2.2.5

name: TheCore Lite v2.2.5
body:
## Changes from v2.2.4
Units keys changes
* Protoss
  * Adept on F (from G)
  * DT on T (from F, dark shrine now on T)
* Zerg
  * Corruptor on V (from G)
  * Ultralisk on G (from V, ultralisk cavern now on G)

## Changes from v2.1
* Protoss gateway unit production keys
  * Adept on F (from G)
  * DT on T (from F, dark shrine now on T)
* Hatch/Lair/Hive changes
  * more alternates for "select larvae":
    * drone (Space)
    * zergling (D)
    * roach (R)
    * hydralisk (C)
    * mutalisk (T)
    * ultralisk (G)
  * non-supported units:
    * overlord (E, same as speed key)
    * viper (CapsLock, same as burrow)    
    * infestor (F, same as Lair/Hive)
    * corruptor (V, same as queen)
    * swarm host (4)
  * queen production moved to V
  * burrow moved to CapsLock
* Zerg unit/building commands changes:
  * Bridge method reapplied to fit building with units
  * Summon Nydus Worm: now Space (more consistent overall)
  * Ravager bile: F rapidFire alternate removed (don't mess up with roach morph)
  * Baneling: now on CapsLock (prevent misstype)
* Some spell reassigned due to "rapidFire caster target cancel split":
  * RapidFire area target alternates for "rapidFire caster target cancel split"
    * R (HT, sentry, oracle, ghost, raven, viper)
    * F for infestor
    * Space kept for ravager reaper liberator
  * Some key binding moved
    * sentry archon merge now CapsLock
    * raven seeker missile now CapsLock,C
    * raven seeker missile now E,R
    * oracle stasis ward now E,Space
    * oracle revelation now C,R
* UI
  * FollowSelection now mapped on Insert
  * CancelDragSelection now mapped on RightMouseButton
* Fix AI commands
  * back to Shift+Alt to prevent conflicts with Alt+Command for autocast activation
* Change Alt+Q from camera center to append to CC/Hatch/Nexus group

name: TheCore Lite v2.2.4
body:
## Changes from v2.2.3
* Zerg
  * Ultralisk cavern is now V (now more trouble with Advanced Building directly chaining with Ultralisk cavern)
  * Ultralisk morph now V (bridge method)
  * Viper morph now CapsLock (swapped with Ultralisk)

* UI
  * FollowSelection now mapped on Insert
  * CancelDragSelection now mapped on RightMouseButton

* Coop unbounds
  * some new Coop disruptor researches unbounds fixed

## Changes from v2.1
* Hatch/Lair/Hive changes
  * more alternates for "select larvae":
    * drone (Space)
    * zergling (D)
    * roach (R)
    * hydralisk (C)
    * mutalisk (T)
    * corruptor (G)
  * non-supported units:
    * overlord (E, same as speed key)
    * viper (CapsLock, same as burrow)    
    * infestor (F, same as Lair/Hive)
    * ultralisk (V, same as queen)
    * swarm host (4)
  * queen production moved to V
  * burrow moved to CapsLock
* Zerg unit/building commands changes:
  * Bridge method reapplied to fit building with units
  * Summon Nydus Worm: now Space (more consistent overall)
  * Ravager bile: F rapidFire alternate removed (don't mess up with roach morph)
  * Baneling: now on CapsLock (prevent misstype)
* Some spell reassigned due to "rapidFire caster target cancel split":
  * RapidFire area target alternates for "rapidFire caster target cancel split"
    * R (HT, sentry, oracle, ghost, raven, viper)
    * F for infestor
    * Space kept for ravager reaper liberator
  * Some key binding moved
    * sentry archon merge now CapsLock
    * raven seeker missile now CapsLock,C
    * raven seeker missile now E,R
    * oracle stasis ward now E,Space
    * oracle revelation now C,R
* UI
  * FollowSelection now mapped on Insert
  * CancelDragSelection now mapped on RightMouseButton
* Fix AI commands
  * back to Shift+Alt to prevent conflicts with Alt+Command for autocast activation
* Change Alt+Q from camera center to append to CC/Hatch/Nexus group

name: TheCore Lite v2.2.3
body:
Finally Zerg should be considered stable \o/

**Changes from v2.2.2:**
* Minor zerg ajustments
  * banelings' explode now on CapsLock to prevent mistakes but keep it at hand (same as "merge templar")
* Fix AI commands
  * back to Shift+Alt to prevent conflicts with Alt+Command for autocast activation
* Change Alt+Q from camera center to append to CC/Hatch/Nexus

**Changes from v2.1:**
* Hatch/Lair/Hive changes
  * more alternates for "select larvae":
    * drone (Space)
    * zergling (D)
    * roach (R)
    * hydralisk (C)
    * mutalisk (T)
    * corruptor (G)
  * non-supported units:
    * overlord (E, same as speed key)
    * viper (V, same as queen)
    * infestor (F, same as Lair/Hive)
    * ultralisk (CapsLock, same as burrow)
    * swarm host (4)
  * queen production moved to V
  * burrow moved to CapsLock
* Zerg unit/building commands changes:
  * Bridge method reapplied to fit building with units
  * Summon Nydus Worm: now Space (more consistent overall)
  * Ravager bile: F rapidFire alternate removed (don't mess up with roach morph)
  * Baneling: now on CapsLock (prevent misstype)
* Some spell reassigned due to "rapidFire caster target cancel split":
  * RapidFire area target alternates for "rapidFire caster target cancel split"
    * R (HT, sentry, oracle, ghost, raven, viper)
    * F for infestor
    * Space kept for ravager reaper liberator
  * Some key binding moved
    * sentry archon merge now CapsLock
    * raven seeker missile now CapsLock,C
    * raven seeker missile now E,R
    * oracle stasis ward now E,Space
    * oracle revelation now C,R
* Fix AI commands
  * back to Shift+Alt to prevent conflicts with Alt+Command for autocast activation
* Change Alt+Q from camera center to append to CC/Hatch/Nexus group

name: TheCore Lite v2.2.2
body:
**Changes from v2.2.1:**
* some zerg stabilization
* some Coop unbound fix
* LoTV campaign keys made more consistent

**Zerg detailed changelog:**
* Speed key back on E (overlord no more mass producible directly for hatcheries, prone to error)
* Burrow and Tunneling Claws researches on CapsLock
* Summon Nydus Worm is now Space
* F alternate for Ravager's Corrosive Bile remove (not to mess up with roach morph if ravager and roaches are in the same group)

name: TheCore Lite v2.2.1
body:
**Changes from v2.2.0**

Another zerg adjustment following unit reassignment:
- Overlord is now E
- Speed key / Ultralisk is now CapsLock

Getting overlord on E makes it easier to produce overlords W+E or W+Space+E+RightClick. It makes macro between races more consistent as MULE and Chronoboost are also mapped on E.

**Zerg units changes from v2.1.0**

Zerg unit production keys adapted for easy en masse production:
- Hatch/Lair/Hive changes
  - more alternates for "select larvae": overlord (E), zergling (D), roach (R), hydralisk (C), mutalisk (T), corruptor (G)
  - queen production moved to V
  - burrow moved to 4
  - non-supported units: viper V (same as queen), infestor F (same as Lair/Hive), ultralisk CapsLock (same as overlord speed), swarm host 4 (same as burrow)
- bridge method reapplied to fit building with units
- speed key=CapsLock

name: TheCore Lite v2.2.0
body:
v2.2.0 update is essentially driven by zerg unit production changes. This aspect is considered stable from this version.

Caster spells were adapted to get standard RapidFire spell for "spell caster RapidFire split" using the V cancelTarget/Stop introduced in v2.1. In case of multiple eligible spells, the spells that won't work with minimap got lower priority, those working without ground were prioritized. Not sure that many will use it, but it doesn't look like a bad idea with respect to overall consistency. In most cases, those alternates are not advised to be used, as they could produce some caster energy waste.

**Changes from v2.1.0**

Zerg unit production keys adapted for easy en masse production:
- Hatch/Lair/Hive changes
  - more alternates for "select larvae": overlord (CapsLock), zergling (D), roach (R), hydralisk (C), mutalisk (T), corruptor (G)
  - queen production moved to V
  - burrow moved to 4
  - non-supported units: viper V (same as queen), infestor F (same as Lair/Hive), ultralisk E (same as overlord speed), swarm host 4 (same as burrow)
- bridge method reapplied to fit building with units

Some spell reassigned due to "rapidFire caster target cancel split":
- RapidFire area target alternates for "rapidFire caster target cancel split"
  - R (HT, sentry, oracle, ghost, raven, viper)
  - F for infestor
  - Space kept for ravager reaper liberator
- Some key binding moved
  - sentry archon merge now CapsLock
  - raven seeker missile now CapsLock,C
  - raven seeker missile now E,R
  - oracle stasis ward now E,Space
  - oracle revelation now C,R

Others:
- change RapidFire assignment for overseer spells
- README.md polishing including table of contents

name: TheCore Lite v2.1.0
body:
**v2.1 Release scope**
- General:
  – unit production key harmonization between protoss and terran
  – bridging method applied for unit production/research/building to have a better consistency
  – compliant with big patch 3.8
- Big changes to be absorbed with respect to v2.0
  – macro groups are back to Q and W, keeping Shift+Q+W mechanics
  – cloak/decloak now on F/CapsLock (due to Infested Banshee), same for pulsar beam
  – zerg keys morph is now F (previously E), speed research is now E (previously C), creep remains C
  – reactor: C, techlab:E, lift:4, select builder:5 to free command card for unit production keys
- New features:
  – rapid fire static defence
  – Stop = TargetCancel that could be useful for caster usage
  – Shift+V = utility group (to be used for creep queen with queued creep tumor spawn)
  – new Control camera approach (with more consistent creep tumor spread strategy)

**Changes from v2.1-beta2**
– no more building on V due to utility group Shift+V recall and V as TargetCancel
– Ctrl+Alt is now modifier for append w/o steal (for caster/unittype fast selection group)
– back to previous simple ctl camera, with Space as alternate for creep tumor spread
– drop of ctl camera warp-in, it does not really make sense with group placement

name: TheCore Lite v2.1 - beta 2
body:
**Changes from v2.1 - beta**
– Stop = TargetCancel that could be useful for caster usage (no longer a RapidFire key)
– some more changes to protoss keys driven by V not being a RapidFire key anymore
– Nexus back to original TheCore Lite (chronoboost=C,E, MsC=CapsLock)
– Shift+V now used for utility group (useful for creep queen)
– E now used as an alternate creep tumor propagation
– control cam changes

All changes that affect Multiplayer are referenced here:
https://github.com/bobo38/TheCoreLite/blob/v2.1-beta2/StableRegression.log

**v2.1 Release scope**
– unit production key harmonization between protoss and terran
– bridging method applied for unit production/research/building to have a better consistency
– rapid fire static defence
– Stop = TargetCancel that could be useful for caster usage
– new Control camera approach
– compliant with big patch 3.8

**Big changes to be absorbed with respect to v2.0**
– macro groups are back to Q and W, keeping Shift+Q+W mechanics
– cloak/decloak now on F/CapsLock (due to Infested Banshee), same for pulsar beam
– zerg keys morph is now F (previously E), speed research is now E (previously C), creep remains C
– reactor: C, techlab:E, lift:4, select builder:5 to free command card for unit production keys

name: TheCore Lite v2.1 - beta
body:
Freeze period: please report any problem/thought, to be released on February 4th 2016

**Release scope**
– unit production key harmonization between protoss and terran
– bridging method applied for unit production/research/building to have a better consistency
– rapid fire static defence implemented
– new Control camera approach
– compliant with big patch 3.8

**Big changes**
– macro groups are back to Q and W, keeping Shift+Q+W mechanics
– cloak/decloak now on F/CapsLock (due to Infested Banshee), same for pulsar beam
– zerg keys morph is now F (previously E), speed research is now E (previously C), creep remains C
– reactor: C, techlab:E, lift:4, select builder:5 to free command card for unit production keys

name: TheCore Lite v2.0
body:
[Hotkeys] section stable
[Command] section consistent with Multiplayer/Coop/Campaigns from December 5th 2016

Big changes:
– Macro groups have been Z and X
– Shift+Z+X mechanics for select prod + jump to rally point or TheCore Lite inject initiate (select queen, jump to hive, ready to queue inject)
– easy cloning with Shift+Alt+RightClick skipping the queueing, Shift+Alt modifier for create non-steal
– attempt of Control camera
